festival.introText:
Hideout Festival Croatia made its spectacular debut in 2010 and has been the talk of the dance festival circuit ever since. Hideout is a beachside event in a stunning and unique location on Zrce Beach, The Isle of Pag, Croatia.

With the previous years being complete sell-outs, each year manages to attract an even bigger lineup. However the organizers refuse to make the capacity bigger, maintaining their focus on quality for each individual festival goer, which makes a refreshing change to most festivals.

Croatia has in recent years become one of the hottest destinations in the world for the clubbing community to go and let loose and many of Europe's most committed dance fans now head there year after year in favour of the traditional summer destinations such as Ibiza. Hideout Festival is perched on one of finest beaches in the area that runs the entire length of the island and is surrounded by a variety of bars, restaurants, water sports and attractions.

festival.location: Zrce Beach in Isle Of Pag

reviews.title: Review of Hideout Festival 2018
reviews.body: Nice venue, people a bit dodgy

faqs.question: When is Hideout Festival?
faqs.answer: Hideout Festival takes place on Sunday 25th - Thursday 29th June 2023.

faqs.question: how to get to Hideout festival croatia?
faqs.answer:
By Plane

The closest airport to Pag is Zadar, which is an hour transfer to the Hideout site. Split is located 2 hours away from Pag, Zagreb 3 hours, Dubrovnik 5.5 hours, and then Trieste and Venice in Italy are 4.5 hours and 5.5 hours respectively. Any queries regarding transfers or any other travel aspect please feel free to contact info@hideoutfestival.com

The Island of Pag is located on the west coast of Croatia. It can be reached easily from a number of major UK airports arriving in Croatia and surrounding countries such as Italy and Hungary.

The closest airport to the Island of Pag is Zadar, which is an hour transfer to the Hideout site. Split is located 2 hours away from Pag, Zagreb 3 hours, Dubrovnik 5.5 hours, and then Trieste and Venice in Italy are 4.5 hours and 5.5 hours respectively.

faqs.question: Does Hideout festival croatia have onsite camping?
faqs.answer: No, Hideout festival Croatia does not have onsite camping. for further information on accommodation please contact customersupport@hideoutfestival.com

faqs.question: disabled access information
faqs.answer: Hideout Festival take the needs of Ticket Holders who are disabled or who have other access requirements very seriously and actively encourages people of all abilities to attend the Event. If you have access requirements for the Event please register your requirements through info@hideoutfestival.com.

faqs.question: What happens If I bought a ticket and cannot attend?
faqs.answer:
Unfortunately we can’t issue you with a refund if you can’t make the event due to work commitments or your mates have dropped out. In these circumstances, we advise passing on your tickets privately to avoid losing out on the money spent.

 

Refunds can only be offered if the event is cancelled or postponed, as agreed upon purchase.

faqs.question: Where is Hideout Festival Croatia?
faqs.answer: Hideout Festival is located at Zrce Beach in Isle Of Pag, Croatia

faqs.question: What do I get with a VIP Ticket?
faqs.answer:
Upgrade your festival ticket to VIP and you will get all of the benefits of the General Ticket with the additional extra features:

Programme on arrival

Access to VIP areas in each club (subject to capacity)

Queue jump for accreditation at Novalja Bus Station

Queue jump for all Hideout Festival venues where possible subject to capacity
